summary: The document is a segment from the JFK Assassination System Identification Form, focusing on an investigation involving Manuel Marti, a DOD-affiliated personnel. It outlines the efforts to locate Juanita Reyes, a character reference for Marti, during a 1968 physical check, which yielded no results. The document, originally classified, has been released with certain deletions and includes agent notes and signatures.
key_findings: The document is part of the JFK assassination investigation system.
It records an unsuccessful search for Juanita Reyes, linked to Manuel Marti.
Originally classified, the document has been made public with some information redacted.
The 108th MI Group was responsible for conducting the investigation.
